sessionHistory.description: Integrated timer panel into kiosk, fixed bugs, made touch-friendly. DEBUGGING pause/stop button issue.
sessionHistory.notes: Integration: Replaced video panel with timer, fixed CSS (.timer-widget flex), querySelector null errors, variable hoisting. Touch improvements: 44-50px buttons, 2px borders, larger fonts, touch-action manipulation, scrollbar styling. BLOCKER: Pause/stop buttons render but don't trigger click events. Event delegation working for main controls but not dynamic timer buttons. Added verbose logging - shows clicks detected on parent divs but 'No button with data-action found'. Timers start correctly, alarms work. Need to inspect HTML to verify data attributes rendering. Possible causes: innerHTML updates breaking delegation, or attributes not rendering in template literals. User testing via Tailscale from laptop. NEXT SESSION: Inspect button HTML, debug event delegation for dynamic content.

sessionHistory.description: INFRASTRUCTURE: Fixed Pi-hole v6 API authentication in system-monitor.js backend. Modal close button bug fixed.
sessionHistory.notes: Debugged and fixed Pi-hole v6 API authentication failure. Root cause: Pi-hole v6 requires X-FTL-SID (session ID) and X-FTL-CSRF (CSRF token) headers in addition to session cookie. Updated authentication flow to extract both sid and csrf from login response, send proper headers with API requests. Fixed response parsing for v6's new structure (queries.total instead of stats.summary.total_queries). Added fallback_iframe URL (http://100.90.104.35/admin) to all error responses for future frontend integration. Authentication now working: 39,260 queries, 74.8% blocked. Also fixed modal close button (X) not working - issue was event listener attached before DOM element existed. System infrastructure now fully operational. NO PROPOSAL1 TASKS - this was system maintenance/debugging.

sessionHistory.description: PHASE 4 COMPLETE: Built comprehensive settings page with tabbed UI, theme selector, panel configuration, and backend API integration
sessionHistory.notes: Created full-featured settings page with 4 tabs (Theme, Panels, Display, About). Theme tab has visual preview cards for all 3 themes with live switching. Panel tab has toggle switches for 8 panels. Display tab has CRT effects, animations, font size, and refresh interval settings. About tab shows system info. Added SettingsManager class with localStorage integration, unsaved changes warning, modal dialogs. Backend API: GET/POST /config/panels for loading/saving, POST /config/panels/reset for defaults. Added settings gear icon to dashboard header with rotating hover effect. 700+ lines of cyberpunk-themed CSS for settings page. Skipped drag-and-drop panel positioning (p4-t4) - deferred to future enhancement. Phase 4 complete: 6/7 tasks (1 skipped). Ready for Phase 5 (Install & Migration).
